Sentencas: The occurrence of cation interdiffusion during sintering and operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) is inevitable, due to high temperatures and chemical potential gradients.
Titulo: Perspective and control of cation interdiffusion and interface reactions in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Cation interdiffusion may be followed by solid state reaction, resulting into the formation of secondary phases.
Titulo: Perspective and control of cation interdiffusion and interface reactions in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Understanding of the factors that trigger the occurrence of cation interdiffusion and interface reactions is crucial towards controlling their occurrences.
Titulo: Perspective and control of cation interdiffusion and interface reactions in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Here, we have discussed the phenomena associated with cation interdiffusion in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Perspective and control of cation interdiffusion and interface reactions in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: We have established that cation interdiffusion and interface reactions occur both during the high temperature sintering and during SOFC operations.
Titulo: Perspective and control of cation interdiffusion and interface reactions in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Case examples where cation interdiffusion and subsequent interface reactions form secondary phases are discussed.
Titulo: Perspective and control of cation interdiffusion and interface reactions in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The various methods that can be used to minimize or control the occurrence of cation interdiffusion are discussed: the use of diffusion barriers, fabrication of strontium free cathode materials, lowering the sintering temperature and the SOFC operating temperature.
Titulo: Perspective and control of cation interdiffusion and interface reactions in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)
